shortcuts.name: Time Announcer
shortcuts.troubleshooting: If voice doesn't work, check that Speech is enabled in Settings > Shortcuts

shortcuts.name: Task Breaker
shortcuts.description: Shatter daunting tasks into bite-sized chunks with Task Breaker. You need to have ChatGPT enabled to get to run this shortcut.
shortcuts.troubleshooting: Make sure you have ChatGPT installed and open. Also, if tasks aren't being broken down effectively, try being more specific in your task description.

shortcuts.name: Start Pomodoro
shortcuts.description: Focus for 25 minutes, then take a 5 minute break
shortcuts.troubleshooting: If notifications aren't appearing, check your notification settings for the Shortcuts app.

shortcuts.name: Self Care Hour
shortcuts.description: Block out time to take care of yourself
shortcuts.troubleshooting: If calendar events aren't being created, check that Shortcuts has permission to access your Calendar.

shortcuts.name: Reflect on the Day
shortcuts.description: Journal about what you accomplished today
shortcuts.troubleshooting: If notes aren't being created, ensure Shortcuts has permission to access your Notes app.

shortcuts.name: Focus Sounds
shortcuts.description: Play ambient sounds that help you focus
shortcuts.troubleshooting: If sounds aren't playing, check your volume settings and ensure you have the required sound files or streaming service access.

shortcuts.name: Log Water
shortcuts.description: Log your water intake in Health app
shortcuts.troubleshooting: If data isn't being logged, make sure Shortcuts has permission to write to the Health app in Settings > Privacy > Health.

shortcuts.name: Unmissable Reminder
shortcuts.description: Create a reminder you can't ignore
shortcuts.troubleshooting: If reminders aren't appearing, check that Shortcuts has permission to access Reminders and that notifications are enabled.

shortcuts.name: Log Caffeine
shortcuts.description: Log the caffeine content of your drinks, into the Health app.
shortcuts.troubleshooting: Ensure the shortcut is installed before you run it on the ADHD Lifesavers App
